explains: n. 错综复杂的事物（或细节）；盘根错节，复杂精细

sentences.en: The price depends on the intricacy of the work.
sentences.cn: 价格取决于工艺的精细程度。

sentences.en: All are ancient crafts, long appreciated for their intricacy and craftsmanship.
sentences.cn: 一切都是古老的工艺品，只要欣赏他们的复杂性和工艺。

sentences.en: Geronimo is one of the more complex projects undertaken by the open source community, comparable to Linux in its intricacy.
sentences.cn: 与Linux相比，Geronimo是由开放源码社区开发的比较复杂的项目之一。
